articles.author: Ripley Cleghorn
articles.title: Measles Cases Are Exploding in These Areas—The Data Reveals Why - Scientific American
articles.description: Measles continues to spread in Texas and other states and has caused the first reported U.S. death from the virus in a decade. Vaccination data over time reveal vulnerabilities in protection
articles.content: A recent resurgence of measles is hitting multiple U.S. states, sending a concerning number of children to hospitals. In the past two months, public health officials have reported a total of 301 conf… [+9427 chars]
